definition: ten million/countless/many/one must by all means
lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands

sentences.english: By then tens of millions of people will have taken ezetimibe.
sentences.chinese: 而那时，数千万的人已经服用了ezetimibe。

sentences.english: Its shadows are an ambush, its lights a surprise .
sentences.chinese: 它的阴影象伏兵千万，它的光泽令人惊异。
喝汤时，千万不要发出响声。

sentences.english: You lean, haggard, please allow me a million times care and long winded.
sentences.chinese: 你瘦了，憔悴了，请允许我千万次的关心和啰嗦。

sentences.english: Never use ladders on a wet floor.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要在湿地板上使用梯子。

sentences.english: Good-bye, my sweet heart. I kiss you and the children many thousand times.
sentences.chinese: 再见了，我亲爱的，千万次地吻你和孩子们。

sentences.english: When you first start learning to drive a stick shift car, don't do it on any kind of a hill.
sentences.chinese: 当您刚开始学习驾驶手动挡时，千万别尝试任何坡道。

sentences.english: In ten years Sony sold 50 million units of the device.
sentences.chinese: 索尼公司在10年之内销售了五千万台沃克曼。

sentences.english: Jwasal Malik is one question away from winning 20 million rupees. How did he do it?
sentences.chinese: 贾马尔距2千万卢比仅有一步之遥，他是如何做到的？

sentences.english: This book since 1930's sold over 60 million copies. One of the best sellers in history.
sentences.chinese: 从30年代至今销售超过6千万本，史上最畅销书籍。

sentences.english: A betta's stomach is about the size of its eyeball, so take care not to feed your fish too much.
sentences.chinese: 斗鱼的胃和它的眼球大小相当，所以千万别喂的太多。

sentences.english: Building facades pulsate with millions of lights and glowing neon display.
sentences.chinese: 在千万灯光和霓虹灯的照耀下。

sentences.english: Never make a move if you are merely optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只是乐观而已，千万不要轻举妄动。

sentences.english: Don't go into your passion with amateur skills.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要以满腔的热情却表现出业余的水平。

sentences.english: Congmin offers money to retrieve the incriminatory evidence. Hongyuan quotes a price of 50million dollars.
sentences.chinese: 聪敏有求用钱赎回他的犯罪证据，宏远索价五千万。

sentences.english: Don't take credit for anyone else's, but make sure you are not invisible.
sentences.chinese: 千万不要抢功，但也要保证你的工作不会被忽视。

definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
to take note of/to pay attention to
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
in order to avoid/so as not to
